welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Reynoldsburg, known for its friendly community and quaint downtown area. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Port Columbus International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Port Columbus International Airport serves domestic flights for airlines such as American Airlines, Delta, and Southwest.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Port Columbus International Airport serves domestic flights for airlines such as United, Spirit, and Frontier.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Port Columbus International Airport serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as Air Canada and Allegiant.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rickenbacker Airport serves all commercial and cargo flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Rickenbacker Airport is primarily used for military and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
